submission:
class Solution:
    def minFlips(self, grid: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        ans = 0
        row = len(grid)
        col = len(grid[0])
        r1 = 0
        r2 = row-1
        c1 = 0
        c2 = col-1
        chg = 0
        c4 = 0
        while r1 < r2:
            c1 = 0
            c2 = col-1
            while c1 < c2:
                cnt = [0]*2
                cnt[grid[r1][c1]] += 1
                cnt[grid[r2][c1]] += 1
                cnt[grid[r1][c2]] += 1
                cnt[grid[r2][c2]] += 1
                ans += min(cnt[0], cnt[1])
                c1 += 1
                c2 -= 1
            if c1 == c2:
                if grid[r1][c1] != grid[r2][c1]:
                    ans += 1
                    chg += 1
                if grid[r1][c1] == 1:
                    c4 += 2
                    c4 %= 4

            r1 += 1
            r2 -= 1
        if r1 == r2:
            c1 = 0
            c2 = col-1
            while c1 < c2:
                if grid[r1][c1] != grid[r1][c2]:
                    ans += 1
                    chg += 1
                elif grid[r1][c1] == 1:
                    c4 += 2
                    c4 %= 4
                c1 += 1
                c2 -= 1
            if c1 == c2 and grid[r1][c1] == 1:
                ans += 1
        if c4 == 2 and chg == 0:
            ans += 2
        return ans
